items.title: Personalized Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation system that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on recent user activity within 1 minute.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline.
dependencies: User profile and activity tracking module
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent recommendation requests.
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA.

notes: User requirement was high-level; assumed core functionality includes personalized recommendations based on user behavior. Metrics and performance targets are inferred and may need validation with stakeholders.
